author: leif
msg: Modify the File Targets rotation strategy so that the time strategy now behaves
as documented.  Ie it now rotates the log file at a specified time of day.  Also
added a new interval strategy which will provide the behavior that was provided

author: leif
msg: Add a new Rotation Strategy which will rotate a file at a specific time of day.

author: donaldp
msg: Update cornerstone jar so that the schema types are URIs rather than shortnames
